articles.author: Maddy Myers
articles.title: Microsoft announces Amazon partnership, bringing Xbox games to Fire TVs
articles.description: Starting Thursday, the Xbox app will be available on select Amazon Fire TV devices, giving users access to the full cloud gaming library.
articles.content:
Update (July 9): On Monday, Xbox announced that the Xbox TV app has officially launched for owners of the applicable Amazon Fire TV Sticks.
